graph_title: Proportion of health facilities that have a core set of relevant essential medicines available and affordable on a sustainable basis
indicator_name: Proportion of health facilities that have a core set of relevant essential medicines available and affordable on a sustainable basis
target_name: Support the research and development of vaccines and medicines for the communicable and non‐communicable diseases that primarily affect developing countries, provide access to affordable essential medicines and vaccines, in accordance with the D<small>OHA</small> D<small>ECLARATION ON THE</small> TRIPS A<small>GREEMENT AND</small> P<small>UBLIC</small> H<small>EALTH</small>, which affirms the right of developing countries to use to the full the provisions in the A<small>GREEMENT ON</small> T<small>RADE-</small>R<small>ELATED</small> A<small>SPECTS OF</small> I<small>NTELLECTUAL</small> P<small>ROPERTY</small> R<small>IGHTS</small> regarding flexibilities to protect public health, and, in particular, provide access to medicines for all
